summary:
Most pieces of modern software (web, desktop or otherwise) include that
innocuous little text box with inviting word "Search" nearby. But behind
it lies a torrid world of bad ideas, worse ideas & ideas no computer
should be made to suffer. If you want to keep your good name & stay out
of the hall of shame, this talk will give you a grounding on how to make
the search in your software better.
title: Avoiding The Search Hall Of Shame
